text: Guo Yuhuai () (born October 1934) is a People's Republic of China politician. He was born in Xiaoyi, Shanxi. He graduated from Shanxi University. He was vice-governor and CPPCC Committee Chairman of his home province.The Rushing on of the Purposes of God: Christian Missions in Shanxi since 1876, by Andrew T. Kaiser, 2016 ==References== Category:1934 births Category:People's Republic of China politicians from Shanxi Category:Communist Party of China politicians from Shanxi Category:Vice-governors of Shanxi Category:CPPCC Committee Chairmen of Shanxi Category:Shanxi University alumni Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Lüliang
title: Guo Yuhuai
